gnat.filter.nei
Class TfIdfFilter

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.nei.TfIdfFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class TfIdfFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

This filter removes all entities with a TF*IDF score below a threshold.

TfIdfFilter

public TfIdfFilter(double threshold)
Creates a new Filter that removes names whose tfidf value is below the given threshold.

TfIdfFilter

public TfIdfFilter(double threshold,
                   Context anotherContext)
Creates a new Filter that removes names whose tfidf value is below the given threshold. DF values are also counted by looking into another context.
